title: CASADEI profile font
content:
I would like your help to find the font used in the CASADEI logo, or a similar font. Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002134im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Casadei_6240.gif)
author: P_P

comments.content: Looks like Goudy Old Style with the serifs cut off.
Ouch, that hurts so much. And it looks plain ugly.
